nodes.text: Osseriton was a penal world located in the galaxy's Unknown Regions. It shared its name with Osseriton Assemblages, the manufacturer of the Oubliette-class transport.

By 28 ABY, the dark side organization known as the Knights of Ren were hired to raid the world, during which they freed the prisoners and stole one of the prison transports, the Oubliette-class transport Night Buzzard.

In Star Wars canon, Osseriton was first mentioned in the 2019 reference book Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker: The Visual Dictionary, written by Pablo Hidalgo. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Osseriton was first mentioned in The New Jedi Order: Force Heretic II: Refugee, a 2003 novel written by Sean Williams and Shane Dix.
